proposal: Hoppy's leap into the meme coin pond has certainly caught our eye! With 123 holders on the ETH network, it's clear you're hopping to success. Imagine enhancing that fun community vibe with your own DEX or a blockchain lottery where every ticket could be a ribbiting surprise. Let's chat about how our tools can add to the amusement without turning your project into a pond too crowded. 🐸🎰
